BEM

This component uses vars to define how you want to handle BEM syntax convention:

Var Default value Related file Description
$bem-element __ bem.scss The BEM element convention prefix.
$bem-modifier -- bem.scss The BEM modifier convention prefix.

Block mixin

This block is designed to work with element and modifier mixins to prevent deep selector nesting.

@include block ('button') {
  background: #3f6c44;
  color: #fff;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding: 4px 8px;
}

This mixin uses the block name parameter as the block selector class name and prevents element and modifier mixins to be used in the wrong way.

.button {
  background: #3f6c44;
  color: #fff;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding: 4px 8px;
}
